column1: Little Goat Diner////I was super excited to come here for brunch last Sunday. The menu was a nice variety with creative items. I settled on the biscuits and gravy and home fries
column2: while my friend got the Japanese pancake with pork belly. I was a bigger fan of her dish than mine
column3: but loved my "little goat latte" which was made with goats milk. Service was good
column4: but unfortunately our waitress disappeared at the end and we spent nearly 2 hours until we were able to cash out.
